revised_title: Observations on the Mouth of Eels and a Strange Aquatic Animal
tldr: The author describes his observations on the mouth of eels in vinegar and a strange aquatic animal using a microscope. He examines the mouth structure and the shape of the animal, which appears to be a triangular, oblong, opaque body with sharp thorns or prickles. The author also discusses the animal's behavior and its possible identity.
